heroSection.description: This image showcases the expertise of our plumbers in residential plumbing work. It depicts a freshly dug trench with new pipes being installed, highlighting our ability to handle underground plumbing projects efficiently.
heroSection.callToAction: Upgrade your home's plumbing system with our reliable and professional services. Contact us today for a free consultation.

heroSection.description: This stunning image captures the beauty of a well-designed outdoor living space, complete with a picturesque deck overlooking a serene lake. It showcases our ability to seamlessly integrate plumbing systems into luxurious outdoor environments.
heroSection.callToAction: Elevate your outdoor living experience with our expert plumbing solutions. Get in touch to bring your dream outdoor space to life.

heroSection.description: This powerful image showcases our expertise in commercial plumbing projects. It depicts a construction site with our team working diligently to install plumbing systems for new buildings, highlighting our capability to handle large-scale projects efficiently.
heroSection.callToAction: Trust our experienced team to handle all your commercial plumbing needs. Contact us for reliable and efficient solutions.

aboutUsSection.description: This image showcases the intricate network of pipes and fittings that make up a plumbing system, highlighting the complexity of our work and our expertise in handling such installations.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image effectively demonstrates the breadth of our plumbing capabilities, making it an ideal choice for the About Us section.

aboutUsSection.description: This image depicts a well-organized and clean mechanical room, showcasing our attention to detail and commitment to delivering professional and tidy work.
aboutUsSection.reason: By showcasing our commitment to quality workmanship, this image instills confidence in potential clients and makes it a suitable choice for the About Us section.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Joshua Akers
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I had issues with toilets and showers emptying. Cox Plumbing was able to get everything fixed. They even came to my house the same day that I contacted them! Great Service!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks bud we are pleased to have you as a customer
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jonathan Barber
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Had a sudden leak at the main water supply entering the house.  Called Cox plumbing. They were available and arrived within an hour.  They explained the process and had it fixed within an hour.  New line needed from outside through the wall to interior shut off.  Good price and fantastic service.  I’ll definitely use Cox Plumbing again.  Very pleased.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you sir  we are pleased to have you as a customer
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Monica Stalling
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Cox Plumbing  Solutions,  Their Staff is Caring , Professional  & Very Knowledgeable,  they  fix my water heater and they was on time and didn't take long. Highly  recommend  wish they had 10 Stars.
Thank You,
Monica Stalling
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you ma'am I do appreciate your buisness and if you need anything just let me know God bless and have a great rest of your weekend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: scott Moulton
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: This guy is not reliable and may be the worst repair person I have ever worked with.  RUN do not walk away!!! Still having issues with anything he touched.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: brittney cummings
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Rex was very commutative. His work was excellent. Very polite. I would highly recommend him and his company. If I ever need plumbing work done i would use his company again. And very reasonable pricing. He has gone above and beyond for me to get my plumbing back up to par. Thank Rex for all you done I highly appreciate you.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Gringlês
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Rex did an awesome job! I had busted the water supply pipe trying to move my clawfoot tub and he came over to fix it the same day I called when no other plumber would answer the phone. He also went above and beyond what anyone would do and fixed a duct while he was in the crawlspace, put the feet back on my tub, pulled a rag out of my garbage disposal, and removed some dead rats out of the crawl space that he came across =O~. Not only that but he was polite and good with the kids and didn't overcharge. I'll definitely call him when I need something else!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kayla Zimmer
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: He fixed our bathroom sink that's been leaking for quite some time and was improperly installed but help us with the problem  in a very fast manner and even helped fix  My Father's dryer even. So grateful to have someone close by and affordable to My Father's house and even dependable.  Will definitely recommend his service and continue for my family for future emergencies!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Chad Harrelson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Rex came out late in the evening very promptly to fix our water leak. Quick response time and great work. I would highly recommend his services!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you bud we are pleased to have you as a customer call us anytime
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Karol Layton
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We needed a plumber right away and no other plumber could come til the next morning. I called Cox Plumbing and Rex told me he would be at my house within the next hour.  He kept his promise and fixed our toilet.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for calling it's our pleasure to come out anytime we appreciate your business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kali
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
I had a tough clog when Ii first got to my home, he worked on it and fixed it.
Very friendly, got the job done immediately and wasn't too expensive. I would recommend him and this buiesness to anyone who needs any help with plumbing. I wish I could give a hundred stars bc he saved the day.... Also I had another company bloww me off bc the job was too difficult but not rex. So 😊
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank yall for the review we are always here if you need anything
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Christy Deerman
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very fast,respectful and got the job done. Fast and great quality work for lil amount of $$!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Michael Cheatham
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I recommend Cox Plumbing to anyone.  Very professional,  kind, and they do excellent work.  Very trustworthy.  I will definitely use the again
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you sir I'm sorry it took so long to respond we have been busy
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Faith Harris
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: He was amazing and very professional! If I could rate more than 5 stars I would.  He was a life saver tonight!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank y'all so much y'all have a great day
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Hill
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for your ratting and y'all have a great day
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Amy Nelson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Rex and his dad have done work for me on several occasions and each time the do a terrific job with a good price for the work.  I highly recommend them for any plumbing job!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you we try to take care of our customers and thanks for you business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mina Jeffers
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Rex Cox of Cox Plumbing Solutions has done several jobs for us. We have been pleased with his service each time. He does quality work, cleans up after himself and his prices are very reasonable. We recommend him and will continue to use him as the need arises.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you to our loyal customers you are the reason we try our hardest every day to be the best.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cox Plumbing Solutions

plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  While the specific licensing details for Cox Plumbing Solutions are not provided in the sources, it is important to note that plumbing contractors in Alabama must be licensed by the Alabama Plumbers and Gas Fitters Examining Board. However, the sources do not specify the license status of Cox Plumbing Solutions. For accurate licensing information, one would need to contact the Alabama Plumbers and Gas Fitters Examining Board or the business directly[2][4].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  Cox Plumbing Solutions is located at 4856 Hwy 47, Shelby, AL 35143. The business serves both domestic and commercial clients in the Shelby area and possibly surrounding regions[2][4].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  The business is open 7 days a week, although specific hours are not detailed in the sources. There is no information provided on the payment methods accepted by Cox Plumbing Solutions[2][4].

- **Years in Operation**:
  The sources do not specify how many years Cox Plumbing Solutions has been in operation[2][4].

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  Cox Plumbing Solutions offers a wide range of services including water line installation, septic tank installation, remodels, kitchen sink and garbage disposal repair and installation, dishwasher repair and installation, leak detection, drain cleaning, and dealing with drainage and blocked toilets. They also advise on water softeners and filters[2][4].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  The business serves the Shelby area and possibly surrounding regions, catering to both residential and commercial clients[2][4].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  Cox Plumbing Solutions is available for emergency call-outs, indicating they provide emergency services[2].

- **Prices or Rates**:
  The sources mention that the business offers competitive prices, but specific rates or prices are not provided[2].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  With a rating of 4.6 from 18 reviews, customers generally praise the business for its professionalism, quality of service, and competitive prices. Customers appreciate the hassle-free and smooth experience provided by Cox Plumbing Solutions[2].

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  There is no information provided in the sources regarding the BBB rating or status of Cox Plumbing Solutions[2][4].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  Common themes include high-quality service, professionalism, and competitive pricing. Customers also appreciate the business's ability to provide a tailored service and its reliability in emergency situations[2].

- **Response to Reviews**:
  There is no information available on how the business responds to customer reviews[2][4].

### Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  The owner of Cox Plumbing Solutions is not explicitly named in the sources, but it is clear that the owner is a specialist in both domestic and commercial plumbing with years of experience[2].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  The sources do not provide detailed information on the qualifications of the staff, but they are described as professional and knowledgeable[2].

- **Professional Certifications**:
  There is no specific information on professional certifications held by the owner or staff of Cox Plumbing Solutions. For accurate information, one would need to contact the business directly or check with relevant licensing authorities[2][4].
aboutUs: Cox Plumbing Solutions is a premier plumbing service provider catering to residential and commercial clients in Shelby and surrounding areas. Our team of highly skilled and knowledgeable professionals specializes in a comprehensive range of plumbing services, from water line installations and septic tank systems to kitchen and bathroom remodels. We take pride in our expertise in leak detection, drain cleaning, and emergency plumbing services, ensuring your plumbing needs are met with efficiency and precision.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the ultimate in plumbing excellence with Cox Plumbing Solutions, where our unwavering commitment to quality and customer satisfaction sets us apart.
sellingPoints: Unparalleled expertise: Our team of seasoned professionals possesses in-depth knowledge and extensive experience in tackling even the most complex plumbing challenges.
Rapid emergency response: We understand the urgency of plumbing emergencies and offer prompt, reliable service to minimize disruptions and restore your plumbing system to optimal condition.
Tailored solutions: We take a personalized approach, carefully assessing your unique needs and providing customized solutions that meet your specific requirements.
